channel.title: Need Error Help!

item.title: Need Error Help!
item.dc:creator: @joejoe_pker joejoe pker
item.description:
@joejoe_pker wrote:

Could someone tell me where i can Add/Delcare these in cause people are cheating and i want to stop it

[code]if (isANoob) { // © ZeroFreeze 2007+
BanCHost = connectedFrom;
}
if (AntiCheat.checkPlayer(playerName)) { // © ZeroFreeze 2007+
PunishThee();
}
if (AntiCheat.checkCommand(command)) { // © ZeroFreeze 2007+
PunishThee();
}
if (!AntiCheat.checkUsername(playerName)) { // © ZeroFreeze 2007+
server.AntiCheat.zprint(“Invalid username!”);
disconnected = true;
}

AntiCheat.scanAll();
[/code]

This is the error:

client.java:18870: illegal start of type
if (isANoob) { // © ZeroFreeze 2007+
^
client.java:18870: expected
if (isANoob) { // © ZeroFreeze 2007+

Read full topic
